This code system http://jpfhir.jp/fhir/Common/CodeSystem/JP_ProcedureCondition_CS defines the following codes:

Code

name: JP_ProcedureCondition_CS
title: JP Core Procedure Condition CodeSystem
publisher: FHIR Japanese implementation research working group in Japan Association of Medical Informatics (JAMI)

contact.name: FHIR Japanese implementation research working group in Japan Association of Medical Informatics (JAMI)

description: 処置中もしくは処置の後に発生した合併症を示すコード(Condition/Problem/Diagnosis)
